description:
TPO/1968/0136 
T2 - Mature Sycamore/Norway Maple (front) - Currently the height is 20m; Reduce height by 3m to previous pollard points and ensure growth is away from the property.

Acton Green Conservation Area
T1 - Small Elder (front) - Crown reduction and shape; Reduce by 2m, height and spread.
T3 - Mature Lime (rear) - Current height is 10m; Reduce height by 2m to previous pollard points.
T4 - Mature Lime (rear) - Current height is 10m; Reduce height by 2m to previous pollard points.
T5 - Small Elder (rear) - Current height is 8m - Crown reduction, thin vertical growth, and shape; Reduce by 1.5m, height and spread.
T6 - Mature Lime (rear) - Current height is 10m; Reduce height by 2m to previous pollard points.
T7 - Young Cherry (rear) - This is a young tree that would benefit from formative pruning; Reduce leggy growth, and remove crossing branches, reduce and shape the crown by 1.5m to encourage a better shape in the future.
T8 - Mature Cherry (rear) - Current height is 10m; Tree has previously been reduced and the natural shape has been compromised; Pollard would enable the tree to regain a more natural shape.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: The tree work specified above must be carried out within 2 years of the date of this decision.

Reason: To ensure the work is only carried out once in respect of this consent and allow Ealing Council the opportunity to reconsider its decision in the light of prevailing circumstances, and reconsult on the case in the event of the consent expiring before implementation.
